title: Human Trafficking Prevention and Response Education for African Community Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental human rights concepts and awareness of community issues
context.additional_context: An asynchronous online interprofessional education course for African community leaders (e.g., Catholic nuns) to educate on the severity of human trafficking and response strategies.

learning_goals: Explain types, signs, and legal procedures of human trafficking and apply them to local case studies
Develop victim support plans for human trafficking through multidisciplinary collaboration
Design prevention campaigns using mobile-accessible digital materials (PDF/video)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
